mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (user_id, consumer_name, consumer_phone, receiver_name, receiver_address, receiver_phone, receiver_request, status, payment_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{consumerName}, #{consumerPhone}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverAddress}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverRequest}, #{status}, #{paymentId})
INSERT INTO ORDER_PRODUCT (order_id, product_id, product_num) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{productNum})
mapper.select: SELECT consumer_name, consumer_phone, receiver_name, receiver_address, receiver_phone, receiver_request, created_at FROM ORDERS WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = false
